content: Does bors forget the 'failed' state of PRs after a synchronization? There's a bunch of PRs now in the queue that failed a while ago and were waiting for the author to update it. (#83698 #84110 #81617) And it's also not reacting to r- for those either. This one for example: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/84110#issuecomment-826104407
generally when you re-sync the queue you have to go through the queue and check because some of the PRs show up even though they are not approved or successful
yeah, but bors r- isn't working, so not sure what state bors thinks that PR is in
I r- it again. Perhaps you issued the command while the sync was still in progress? The sync seems to take a very long time.
bors is now testing a merged PR :eyes: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/84450#issuecomment-826449822
seems to be testing https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/84543, really, so should be ok, even if spurious message there
